name: Better Login Security and History
author: tieuthutrieugia

sections.description:
Login with captcha.
Protect your login page from Brute-force attacks also you can track login history.
Features:

  • Captcha on the admin login page to protect against auto-hacking.
  • You can set the number of failed logins to show Captcha or showing it always.
  • Login Blocker option to block the login processe for a period of time after specific number of failed logins.
  • Login history to show all login processes in details.
sections.installation:
• Go to the wordpress control panel and go to “Plugins” menu and press the button “Add New”.
  • Go to the tab “Upload” and choose the file “better-login-security-and-history.zip”, click the button “Upload” to get the file uploaded.
  • Lockup the plugin, and click “Activate” to get it active.
  • Go to the Options page and configure the plugin.

view this posts if you want more details about installing plugins:
http://www.wpfasthelp.com/how-to-install-wordpress-plugins.htm
